string.value: Chocolate Fondue Chair

string.name: desc

string.value: Half-Heart Chocolate Cake Chair

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A Heart Chair for Lovers.

string.name: name
string.value: Ultimate Masterpiece Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Holy moly look at this work! The line weight, the brush work, the chiaroscuro lighting!\nIf you sit in Ultimate Masterpiece Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: name
string.value: Sort of a Painting Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: This painting could have gotten a little more love.\nIf you sit in Sort of a Painting Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: name
string.value: Unpainted Masterpiece Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: What is a blank canvas, but an invitation to dazzle?\nIf you sit in Unpainted Masterpiece Chair, 10 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: name
string.value: Heart Cloud Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this what it's like to sit in a cloud? Probably not, clouds are just frozen gatherings of gaseous moisture! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Know-How Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Tot knows how to teach, and this chair keeps it going forever and ever and ever.\nIf you sit in Know-How Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: name
string.value: Chinchillin' Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody on Southperry.net knows that a Mapler's best friend is a giant fluffy Chinchilla; mostly because it doubles a pillow between adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Stork Aviator Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: So THAT's where chairs come from. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Owl Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Purchases by rodents or rodent-lovers not recommended. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Welsh Corgi Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Truly, this must be heaven. Smelly, biting, slobbery heaven. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Cloud Stroller Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Just keep in mind that clouds are made of frozen water when you're trying to explain away that giant puddle on your rear end. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Bunny Tornado Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a cute name, but seriously, find a mattress to hunker under until it passes. Those teeth are really sharp. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Crystalline Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Like most expensive things, this chair is all hard angles and back pain, but your friends will be TOTALLY jealous. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: King Pepe Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: It's hard to say why King Pepe has allowed himself to be a chair, but you don't second-guess comfort. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Loyal Royal Yeti Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: No wonder King Pepe always looks so smug and superior. This thing could knock over a house! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: The Old and the Wise Chair

string.name: desc

string.value: Friend of the Miwoks
